__e: Vivian is the only person Who accepts me for who I am.
I can't just leave her to these people.
Am I to take it that Lady Vivian is part of our plan?
Vivian, I will not let you do this to our family.
I mean, you can't possibly be like this all the time or the Vivian I know never would've married you.
I can't lose my son and I can't have Vivian die and I cannot settle for millions when I haven't done anything wrong.
Uh, I told him that I was a friend of Vivian's and that I hadn't seen her since she gave me the coat.
But I am Vivian's father, and she is my wife, and she knows the proper way to care for and raise a child.
The thing is, I really like this guy, and he's so good with Vivian... and me.
